titles.title: Who Is On The Lord's Side (takes a little wo

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}By Thy grand redemption By Thy grace divine We are on the Lord's side Saviour we are Thine{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Who is on the Lord's side Who will serve the King Who will be His helpers Other lives to bring Who will leave the world's side Who will face the foe Who is on the Lord's side Who for Him will go{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Not for weight of glory Not for crown and palm Enter we the army Raise the warrior psalm But for love that claimeth Lives for whom He died He whom Jesus nameth Must be on His side{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus Thou hast bought us Not with gold or gem But with Thine own lifeblood For Thy diadem With Thy blessing filling Each who comes to Thee Thou hast made us willing Thou hast made us free{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Fierce may be the conflict Strong may be the foe But the King's own army None can overthrow Round His standard ranging Victory is secure For His truth unchanging Make the triumph sure Chosen to be soldiers In an alien land Chosen called and faithful For our Captain's band In the service royal Let us not grow cold Let us be right loyal Noble true and bold{/lang-eng}
